Key Match Events: Füllkrug scored two of the team's eight goals at Euro 2024, including the most crucial strike so far, a headed equalizer in injury-time against Switzerland
Pre-Game Insights: Nagelsmann has a selection head-scratcher to consider between Florian Wirtz and Niclas Füllkrug for the starting XI
Nagelsmann's replacements have thrived in three different situations
Post-Match Reflections: Nagelsmann spoke with a group of players he expected to be most often used as subs in the buildup to the tournament, including Füllkrug
The team spirit is palpable, it is not just a slogan
Nagelsmann's squad is now one game away from getting to the quarterfinals
Miscellaneous Highlights: A mosquito outbreak infested the team's training camp
Torrential weather is beckoning around game-time — hailstones and lightning and all the rest
Others: Comparisons between this Germany team and 2006 group that made it to the semifinal of the World Cup on home soil are increasing in frequency
